mondrian.test

Class PropertySaver

  • java.lang.Object
    • mondrian.test.PropertySaver

  • public class PropertySaver
extends Object
    Sets properties and logging levels, and remembers the original values so they can be reverted at the end of the test.
    Since:
    Oct 28, 2008
    Author:
    jhyde
